name: Dandelions Forever
description:
A game simulation about filling a field with dandelions. They'll grow on their own, or you can give them a little help with a mouse click or tap.

Team:

  • Art - Craig Hamilton (@CraigoryHam - https://craigoryham.itch.io/)
  • Music - Mike Matarazzo (@mfmatarazzo - https://mfmis.itch.io/)
  • Code - Micha Faw (@ghostmaple - https://ghostmaple.itch.io/)
